name: Plane.io Realtime Battle
description:
Plane.io Realtime Battle is an all new plane shooting and surviving game. The goal of this game is to defeat all of your competitors on the map and fight to the last one. Then you'll survive and win! Battle against the cunning enemies now. Try and enjoy the unique plane battle game!

How to play?
-- Control your plane to move around by virtual control lever when your finger touches the screen.
-- Survive and level up with the supplies appeared in the sky.
-- Fire and shoot your opponents when they show up and come close. Your plane will aim at your competitors automatically.
-- Skillfully make the best use of the clouds to attack.
-- Pay attention to the airflow, it will reduce your plane speed.
-- Always remember to upgrade the attack and power of your warplane.

Game Features:
-- Unique real-time plane battle gameplay
-- Auto-targeting with just one click
-- Variety of props assist you to fight and level up xp!
-- Highly optimized graphics and sounds.
-- 3D role and scene, gorgeous combat visual effects.
-- Cool skins and planes for your choice. Make your own one!

Download Plane.io Realtime Battle, enjoy the battle and be the king of the sky now!
